TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeLibConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibConverter
Public NotInheritable Class TypeLibConverter Implements ITypeLibConverter

summary.span: 提供一組服務，將 Managed 組件 (Assembly) 轉換為 COM 型別程式庫，反之亦然。

span.span: Provides a set of services that convert a managed assembly to a COM type library and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, string strTypeLibName, System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibExporterFlags flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink notifySink);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, string strTypeLibName, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibExporterFlags flags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink notifySink) cil managed

public: virtual System::Object ^ ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib(System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly, System::String ^ strTypeLibName, System::Runtime::InteropServices::TypeLibExporterFlags flags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ITypeLibExporterNotifySink ^ notifySink);

param.name: assembly
param.span: 要進行轉換的組件。

span.span: The assembly to convert.

param.name: strTypeLibName
param.span: 產生的型別程式庫的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file name of the resulting type library.

param.span: 值，表示任何特別設定。

param.span: 呼叫端所實作的 介面。

span.span: The interface implemented by the caller.

summary.span: 將組件轉換為 COM 型別程式庫。

span.span: Converts an assembly to a COM type library.
An object that implements the interface.

summary.span: 將 COM 型別程式庫轉換為組件。

span.span: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (object typeLib, string asmFileName, int flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, byte[] publicKey, System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(object typeLib, string asmFileName, int32 flags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, unsigned int8[] publicKey, class System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces) cil managed

Public Function ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (typeLib As Object, asmFileName As String, flags As Integer, notifySink As ITypeLibImporterNotifySink, publicKey As Byte(), keyPair As StrongNameKeyPair, unsafeInterfaces As Boolean) As AssemblyBuilder

public: virtual System::Reflection::Emit::AssemblyBuilder ^ ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(System::Object ^ typeLib, System::String ^ asmFileName, int flags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ITypeLibImporterNotifySink ^ notifySink, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ publicKey, System::Reflection::StrongNameKeyPair ^ keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

param.name: typeLib
param.span: 實作 介面的物件。

span.span: The object that implements the interface.

param.name: asmFileName
param.span: 產生的組件的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file name of the resulting assembly.

param.name: flags
param.span: 值，表示任何特別設定。

span.span: A value indicating any special settings.

param.name: notifySink
param.span: 呼叫端所實作的. 介面。

span.span: interface implemented by the caller.

param.name: publicKey
param.span: 含有公開金鑰的 陣列。

span.span: A array containing the public key.

param.name: keyPair
param.span: 物件，含有共用和私密的密碼編譯金鑰組。

span.span: A object containing the public and private cryptographic key pair.

param.name: unsafeInterfaces
param.span: 如果為 ，則介面需要 使用權限的連結時期檢查。

span.span: If , the interfaces require link time checks for permission.

param.span: 如果為 ，則介面就必須進行需要堆疊查核行程 (Stack Walk) 以及較昂貴卻可以協助提供較多保護的執行階段檢查。

span.span: If , the interfaces require run time checks that require a stack walk and are more expensive, but help provide greater protection.

summary.span: 將 COM 型別程式庫轉換為組件。

span.span: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.

returns.span: 物件，包含已轉換的型別程式庫。

span.span: An object containing the converted type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不想要產生強式名稱的組件，可供`publicKey`和`keyPair`是`null`，只要`flags`不等於。If you do not want to generate a strong name for your assembly, it is valid for `publicKey` and `keyPair` to be `null`, as long as `flags` does not equal . 否則，至少其中一個參數必須指定。Otherwise, at least one of these parameters must be specified. 如果`publicKey`是`null`中的公開金鑰`keyPair`會設定在目標組件資訊清單中繼資料，而且會產生簽章的組件內容為基礎。If `publicKey` is `null`, the public key in `keyPair` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and a signature will be generated based on the contents of the assembly. 如果`keyPair`是`null`，`publicKey`會設定在目標組件資訊清單中繼資料，而且會產生沒有簽章。If `keyPair` is `null`, `publicKey` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and no signature will be generated. 指定這兩個參數通常很有用，並不會導致無效的簽章。Specifying both parameters is not generally useful, and can result in an invalid signature. 如需有關`ITypeLib`，請參閱 MSDN library 中的現有文件。For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

-or-

is not .
-or-

exception.span: 所產生的中繼資料具有阻止任何型別載入的錯誤。

span.span: The metadata produced has errors preventing any types from loading.

permission.span: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

span.span: for permission to call unmanaged code.
Security Action: Demand.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不想要產生強式名稱的組件，可供`publicKey`和`keyPair`是`null`，只要`flags`不等於。If you do not want to generate a strong name for your assembly, it is valid for `publicKey` and `keyPair` to be `null`, as long as `flags` does not equal . 否則，您必須指定至少其中一個參數。Otherwise, atleast one of these parameters must be specified. 如果`publicKey`是`null`中的公開金鑰`keyPair`會設定在目標組件資訊清單中繼資料，而且會產生簽章的組件內容為基礎。If `publicKey` is `null`, the public key in `keyPair` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and a signature will be generated based on the contents of the assembly. 如果`keyPair`是`null`，`publicKey`會設定在目標組件資訊清單中繼資料，而且會產生沒有簽章。If `keyPair` is `null`, `publicKey` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and no signature will be generated. 指定這兩個參數通常很有用，並不會導致無效的簽章。Specifying both parameters is not generally useful, and can result in an invalid signature. 如需有關`ITypeLib`，請參閱 MSDN library 中的現有文件。For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly/CPP/convert1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly/CS/convert1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly/VB/convert1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, out string asmName, out string asmCodeBase);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(valuetype System.Guid g, int32 major, int32 minor, int32 lcid, [out] string& asmName, [out] string& asmCodeBase) cil managed
Public Function GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (g As Guid, major As Integer, minor As Integer, lcid As Integer, ByRef asmName As String, ByRef asmCodeBase As String) As Boolean

public: virtual bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmCodeBase);

param.name: g
param.span: 型別程式庫的 GUID。

span.span: The GUID of the type library.

param.name: major
param.span: 型別程式庫的主要版本號碼。

span.span: The major version number of the type library.

param.name: minor
param.span: 型別程式庫的次要版本號碼。

span.span: The minor version number of the type library.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 型別程式庫的 LCID。

span.span: The LCID of the type library.

param.name: asmName
param.span: 與 g 建立關聯的主要 Interop 組件的名稱 (在成功地傳回時)。

span.span: On successful return, the name of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

param.name: asmCodeBase
param.span: 與 g 建立關聯的主要 Interop 組件的程式碼基底 (在成功地傳回時)。

span.span: On successful return, the code base of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

summary.span: 取得指定的型別程式庫主要 Interop 組件的名稱和程式碼基底。

span.span: Gets the name and code base of a primary interop assembly for a specified type library.

returns.span: 如果主要 Interop 組件在登錄中找到，則為 ﹔否則為 。

span.span: if the primary interop assembly was found in the registry; otherwise .
